articles.author: TN Digital
articles.title: Karan Johar finally opens up on Anupam Kher’s The Kashmir Files, says ‘it’s no longer a film, it’s a movement’ - Times Now
articles.description: Vivek Agnihotri's The Kashmir Files has been grabbing a lot of attention from across the globe ever since its release. Filmmaker Karan Johar has also finally opened up on the movie and revealed that it has become 'a movement'. Read on to know in details.
